about.title: About Me
about.intro:
Hello, I am Uzeyir, a software developer in the front-end field. I know a lot about React, Next.js, and UI/UX design. I help people by using my knowledge and experience. 
I can support you by giving solutions based on your needs. Please contact me for more details about my services.

1.title: # News Website
1.description: This was one of my first projects. It helped me learn about web technologies, content management, and data transfer. I gained practical experience and learned how to build and manage a website.

2.title: 📊 Talent Analysis for Students
2.description: This project helps students find their talents. Students can enter their skills and interests. This makes it easier for them to choose a career.

3.title: 📚 BITurk – Turkish Language Learning App
3.description: BITurk is a mobile and web app to help users learn Turkish. This project helped me improve my skills in application development and creating engaging learning tools.

4.title: ⌗ Npm Library for Real-Time Data Transfer
4.description: This project focused on real-time data transfer. I created a library that can be easily added to LMS platforms to send instant notifications and schedules.

5.title: 🎯 Online Game with Social Features
5.description: This project allows users to meet and play games together. I learned a lot about building real-time multiplayer systems and online services.

6.title: 🍪 3D Cookie Cutter Generator
6.description: In this project, users can upload an image. The system detects the edges to create 3D-printable cookie cutter files. This project improved my image processing skills.

7.title: 🌍 360 Degree Virtual Tour Web Application
7.description: I created a web app with Three.js that lets users explore virtual environments in 360 degrees. This project deepened my knowledge of 3D technologies.

8.title: 🏠 Remote Home Control Application
8.description: This project focuses on controlling home devices using WiFi. I gained experience in IoT systems, hardware integration, and real-time monitoring.
